players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Diana's death is a shock; we must discuss suspicions carefully to find the mafioso."
Charlie: "I'm devastated about Diana. We need to work together here. Alice, you spoke first - what are your initial thoughts on who might be suspicious?"
Bob: "I'm the detective, and I investigated Charlie last night. He's the mafioso. We should vote him out today."
Bob: "I stand by my claim—Charlie is the mafioso based on my investigation. We must vote him out today to protect the town."
Charlie: "Bob, that's a very convenient claim to make when you're the real mafioso trying to frame me! Why would a real detective reveal themselves so early and become an easy target?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
